---
title: "Best Month to Get a Flu Shot"
author: "Lawrence Wu"
date: "2024-08-23"
categories: [data, flu]
---

The best month to get a flu shot is October. This is based on a natural experiment of 800,000 kids across 7 flu seasons in America.

[Source: WSJ](https://www.wsj.com/health/yes-there-is-a-best-month-to-get-your-flu-shot-03bf2e00?mod=hp_lista_pos2).
